name: procedural enchiladas
description:
warning: cutscenes don't load for some god-forsaken reason, so sit tight while i troubleshoot the problem

an old game jam game that i recently decided to finish off and upload. it's a cooking game where you have to make enchiladas in a randomly-generated kitchen. props to my amigo: artie b, for all of the game's music.

controls - arrow keys/wasd to move, q to submit order, e to delete currently held item
